name: Volcanion Prism Star
author: Naoki Saito
flavor_text: It expels its internal steam from the arms on its back. It has enough power to blow away a mountain.

abilities.name: Jet Geyser
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a {W} Energy card from your hand. If you do, your opponent switches their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sauna Blast
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
